name: Finobe Late 2017 [pizzaboxer's fork]
description:
A theme that aims to bring back the feel of Late 2017 Finobe.

Forked from BrianGriffen's [https://userstyles.org/styles/183619/finobe-2017]

I know Robert already made a theme that does this, but it hasn't been updated at all, and is missing stuff.

DM me any suggestions for me to try and implement at pizzaboxer#7142 !
additional_info:
-------- 12/05/2020 / FL2017 v1.4 --------

> Footer text has changed to be like 2017's.

-------- 12/05/2020 / FL2017 v1.3 --------

> Removed the stats/badges tab on the Place page
> Removed padding from Server Join button
> Changed the search button text on the Users and Catalog page
> Catalog Item Cards have the grey Diu footer and less padding as seen here [https://blog.finobe.com/2017/10/10/finobe-october-press-release/]
> Forum pagination is now aligned left on the bottom

-------- 12/05/2020 / FL2017 v1.2 --------

> The CSS shouldn't affect the blog anymore
> Removed the vote counter/buttons on forum posts
> Fixed the padding in the notifications dropdown

-------- 12/05/2020 / FL2017 v1.1 --------

> Added back the old BUSY logo in the navbar
> Adjusted padding and readded bullet points to the catalog type selector
> Removed the filter button [ who uses it again?? ]
> Changed text on the homepage to what it should be [ the secondary text won't show when logged in :c ]
> Removed the "Latest Places" listing and the "Quick Links" text. [ i can't get rid of the "Latest Places" text :cc ]
> Removed the vote counter on the forum homepage

-------- 12/05/2020 / FL2017 v1.0 --------

> Adjusted padding in dropdown card
> Avatar doesn't show anymore on homepage
